messages.title: JUST WHO THERESA MAY DOESN'T WANT IN THE NEXT PARLIAMENT...
messages.content:
1. An economist who will take the Tories to task over their economic mismanagement.
2. An expert on tax, who will resist Theresa May turning the UK into a post-Brexit tax haven.
3. An MEP with deep understanding of the EU and contacts across Europe that she will use to oppose the Tories' damaging Brexit plans.

messages.title: IT'S GREEN OR LABOUR IN BRISTOL WEST
messages.content: Bristol is special. You're voting in a seat where the Green Party can win. The Tories don't stand a chance here so you have a genuine choice. Molly Scott Cato is an experienced, bold voice for our city, who will speak up for you on a national stage. Vote for a future to believe in.
